firstSection.text: Our upholstery workshop, which has been in business since 1992, offers a wide range of upholstering services for various types of furniture, including church pews, antiques, everyday furniture and specialty chairs. We invite you to learn more about our offer in the various tabs.

We provide free quotes for upholstering pews in churches across the country of Poland. This is a great opportunity to see material samples and sample pew coverings in person, and choose the best solution for each church. Contact us to schedule an appointment and get a free quote.

secondSection.text: Our company has developed a non-invasive method of upholstering church pews. The solution provides a durable and effective upholstery of pews while keeping the surface intact. Our method stands out from other methods available on the market because it does not cause the covering to move or pull off the pew during use. We offer the best solutions to meet the expectations and requirements of our customers. Contact us to learn more about upholstering church pews.

firstSection.text: We offer a wide selection of fabrics and leathers, so we can provide a variety of styles and designs to fit your needs.

secondSection.text: We offer upholstery services of antiques and contemporary furniture. Our company specializes in furniture renovation and upholstering, catering to individual customer requirements. Feel free to contact us to learn more about our offer.

firstSection.text: We undertake upholstery services for items beyond typical everyday furniture. Among other things, we upholster headrests and specialty seats, including dental, optical, and dialysis chairs. We also sew curtains and theater props, as well as panniers for rally cars. Contact us to learn more.
